en.title: Deputy Team Lead
en.institution: Belzabar Software Design India Pvt Ltd
en.text: Leading and mentoring a team of 6+ developers on architecture, quality, and performance for a Java-Spring + Redis-based CMS platform.
list: Improved code quality by 30% through mentorship and reviews
Reduced bug resolution time by 40% through proactive maintenance
Led sprint planning, reviews, and delivery improvements (+25% efficiency)

Reduced frontend dev time by 40%, UX load time by 30%
Built optimized Java Spring APIs (−50% request time)
Improved CI/CD with AWS EC2 deployments (−60% failures)
